# 日期格式化函数

  function fromatDate (now) {
    const nows = new Date(Number(now))
    var year = nows.getFullYear()
    const month = nows.getMonth() + 1
    const date = nows.getDate()
    var hour = nows.getHours()
    var minute = nows.getMinutes()
    return year + '-' + month + '-' + date + ' ' + hour + ':' + (minute > 10 ? minute : '0' + minute)
  }

使用

var date = new Date()

fromatDate(date)

得到结果 "2020-6-24 11:18"
